title: Lavasa creditors invoke DPIL's guarantee
description: Creditors invoked a guarantee due to CIRP non-compliance, halting the Lavasa project. Legal battles continue as lenders lose confidence in the resolution applicant. NCLT and NCLAT petitions are pending, with DPIL seeking more time.
